topic.title: Route Inbound Calls without Limit
topic.shortdesc: This topic describes how to configure inbound route on to route inbound calls without limit of DID numbers and Caller IDs.

body.p: Any user call in the selected trunk will be routed to the inbound route destination.

ul.li: Name: Set a name according to your preference.

Destination: Set the destination.
Leave all other fields blank.
